name: Cozy Room
description:
Cozy Room is a virtual room where you can enjoy the world’s most amazing companionship: Mr. Fofiño!
Decorate your room and do whatever you need in this relaxing environment.
Customize your room and unlock decor items by solving puzzles that tell the rescue story of our dear Fofiño.
You can also build your own playlist, directly from your computer, with your favorite music.

  • A cozy distraction-free environment
  • Use your own playlist
  • Customize your room
  • The cutest cat in the world
